Your Conferencing Account Number is: [account.acctgrpid]

Your Confirmation Number is: [account.accountid]

Dial-In Numbers:
Toll Free: [dialinNo.tollfreeno] (Callers in the USA)
Toll: [dialinNo.tollno] (Callers world wide pay toll charges)

Chairperson Entry Code: [account.cec]#
Participant Entry Code: [account.pec]#

Maximum Number of Lines: 100

To begin an audio conference:

  1. At the agreed upon meeting date and time, the Chairperson and Participants dial in to the conference call.
  2. Participants enter the Participant Entry Code followed by the # sign.
  3. The Chairperson(s) enter the Chairperson Entry Code followed by the # sign.
  4. Participants using the Participant Entry Code will be placed on separate music hold until a Chairperson joins the call using the Chairperson Code.
  5. If the Chairperson enters the call first, Participants will be placed directly on the call with an entry tone.

Please view our Users Guide at www.conferencecallsunlimited.com/docs/User Guide_ReslessPhoneConferencing.pdf for a list of advanced features.

Operator Availability: If you need assistance, Operators are available Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM-8:00 PM, Eastern Time. Press *0 and be privately connected to an Operator.

After Hours Technical Assistance: If you are having technical difficulties after hours, and need assistance, dial 973-271-7382. You will be instructed to leave a detailed message, including your phone number, and a technician will return your call.

Thank you for choosing Conference Calls Unlimited!
